name: Shooty Ghost
description:
You are trapped in the Haunted Mansion. Surrounded by ectoplasmic beasts and spooky noises. Can you make it to the final room alive? Use your trusty shotgun to help propel yourself through the air. And don't be afraid of death. There are many grave sites one can...rise from...

I made this for a game jam using Unity's 2D tutorial as a base. I added mechanics and some art. I also used a lot of royalty free assets to help fill things out in the limited time so it would be less generic.
